definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: As geologists, we work in the fied most of the time.
sentences.chinese: 作为地质学家，我们大部分时间在野外工作。

sentences.english: Local authorities and geologists are still investigating what caused the sinkhole.
sentences.chinese: 当地官员及地质学家仍在调查此次地陷发生的原因。

sentences.english: Its existence depends entirely on what geologists call the mid-Atlantic ridge.
sentences.chinese: 它的存在完全取决于地质学家所称的中大西洋海脊。

sentences.english: The types of data which geologists collect are quite varied and numerous.
sentences.chinese: 地质学家所收集的资料是多种多样的并且数量很大。

sentences.english: The geologist proves up a coal deposits.
sentences.chinese: 地质学家探明了一个煤矿的藏量。

sentences.english: Rusty the Nimble Numbat is discovered by a pair of geologists.
sentences.chinese: 一地质学家发现敏捷的袋食蚁兽Rusty。

sentences.english: The geologist proves up a coal deposit.
sentences.chinese: 地质学家探明了一个煤矿的藏量。

sentences.english: Geologists study lineaments in the pictures.
sentences.chinese: 地质学家们研究图片中的地貌。

sentences.english: Geologists use artificial earth shocks petroleum.
sentences.chinese: 地质学家用人造地震来寻找石油。

sentences.english: The geologists and oil explorers suffered from all kinds of hardships and located oil reserves finally.
sentences.chinese: 地质学家和石油勘探者们历尽艰辛，终于找到了石油。

sentences.english: Saying goodbye to geologists. They went another way.
sentences.chinese: 同地质学家告别，他们踏上另一段路。

sentences.english: As geologist, we work in the field most of the time.
sentences.chinese: 地质学家，我们大部分时间在野外工作。

sentences.english: Wallace had suggested that Darwin forward the paper to Scottish geologist Charles Lyell.
sentences.chinese: 华莱士建议达尔文将论文转寄给苏格兰地质学家赖尔。

sentences.english: The Hawaiian islands were formed by what geologists call "hot spot" volcanos.
sentences.chinese: 夏威夷群岛是由地质学家们所称的“火山热点”组成。

sentences.english: Geologists use artificial earth shocks C. in their search for petroleum.
sentences.chinese: 地质学家用人造地震来寻找石油。

pinyin: tian1 ti3 wu4 li3 xue2 jia1
